Sort Em All-- A classic and addictive water sort tube puzzle game. Different from other glass water sort and merge puzzle games, Sort Em All requires a stronger logic to sort and merge the color water into the tubes. You just need to tap the tubes and pour the color water or liquid. 


Game Goal:
There are several glasses or tubes with color water. The goal is to tap the glasses or tubes and merge the same color water in the same glass. 


How To Play:
-- Tap any glasses and pour the water into another glass or tube to merge them. 
-- Think carefully. Each glass can contain more than two colors at the beginning. You need to merge the different color water step by step. 
-- Get stuck? Use tools! You can either restart the level or add another glass. Don’t hesitate to use hints! These tools are really powerful! 


Feature: 
-- The water sorting interface is unique and attractive. You can change the backgrounds after winning more levels. 
-- Complete more puzzles to unlock unique glass and tube shapes. You can get more backgrounds by finishing more water puzzle levels.

Tips: 
Rome is not built in one day! It is the same to master a color sort puzzle! Take your time to learn the basic rules of this water sorting puzzle game! 
You need to classify colors first and think which color to take out first. Each step you make will bring consequences to the rest of the game.
